newsitem.title: FRANCE: French thieves find cashpoint stronger than wall.
newsitem.headline: French thieves find cashpoint stronger than wall.

text.p: Thieves who used an earth-moving machine to try to break open an automatic cash dispenser failed in the attempt -- but brought down the wall in which the cashbox was set.

The newspaper France-Soir said on Thursday the thwarted thieves in Estrees-Saint Denis, north of Paris, fled after the wall collapsed under the onslaught of the mechanical digger while the dispenser remained stubbornly intact.
